name: X Pay
description:
X Pay is an easy - to - use digital wallet that provides you with a safe and convenient digital asset management experience. Whether you are a user of Ethereum, Tron, or other digital currencies, X Pay can meet your needs.
Features:
- Secure and Reliable: X Pay adopts advanced encryption technology to ensure the safety of your assets at all times.
- Multi - chain Support: It supports multiple major blockchains, including Ethereum, Tron, Binance Chain, etc.
- Easy Transfer: Transfer with one click and manage your digital assets anytime, anywhere.
- Multi - language Support: It has a multi - language interface to meet the needs of users of different languages.
release_date: Thu May 15 2025 11:30:35 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
change_log:
1. The BTCMeta chain has been newly added, and functions such as transfer and receipt of funds for it are supported.
2. Related bugs have been fixed.
author: @nikola-x.com
